name: Midnight Dash (RanchOnBread)
description:
A Fast-Paced Parkour + FPS, Requiring Fast Wall-Runs and Even Faster Reaction Time. Complete Your Daily Run In An Effort To Make The City A Safer Place!

Controls

WASD To Move

Mouse To Aim

L-Click To Shoot

Music By Evan King - https://evankingmusic.com/licensing/

Also Sorry If The Sensitivity Is too High, Will Probably Add Sensitivity Slider In Future Build. If You Want To Experience This Game At Its Best, Please Change Mouse DPS Settings
